algorithm_technique: Finding the minimum and maximum elements, then counting elements strictly between them.
problem_summary_simple: Count numbers in an array that are not the smallest or largest.
problem_summary_technical: Identifies the minimum and maximum values in the array and counts elements strictly between them.
key_insights: An element `x` has a strictly smaller and strictly greater element if and only if `min(nums) < x < max(nums)`.
Finding the minimum and maximum elements can be done in a single pass or using built-in functions.
Duplicate minimum or maximum values do not affect the count of elements strictly between them.
